about_the_game:
This is a DEMO version of Krystopia: Nova´s Journey. In this version you'll get to play the first part of chapter 1 of the game.

Krystopia: Nova's Journey is a captivating new puzzle adventure where you will explore and solve your way through a mysterious land full of intriguing secrets. In the role of space explorer Nova Dune, you observe the environment and navigate in a typical point and click-fashion to solve puzzles and progress through the game and figure out the mystery on the mesmerizing planet of Krystopia. The game is an independent sequel to Krystopia: A Puzzle Journey.

* Unique character based and story driven puzzle adventure
* Innovative, fun and challenging puzzles
* Immersive soundtrack & audio experience
* Unwind by watching and interacting with the beautiful surroundings of Krystopia
* Explore and resolve the mystery of Krystopia
* A mystery conveyed in a beautiful atmospheric setting.
* Collect unique and mysterious artifacts
* Encounter and interact with intriguing characters (some being complete buffoons...)
